column4: hey guys, I need some help. how the hell do I get into my routers menu? I know that its adress should be192.168.1.1 (I pinged it). if i put this into FFor opera it just loads forever
using another browser
if opera not working for you use firefox or Konqueror
what type of router do you have
let me check on it..but you be able to do : http://192.1.168.1 in any browser and it will ask for login/password
are you still on here
did you find your answer about your router ?
sorry for tre delay...stil researching
yes a big difference
so basically you have one connection from the wall to your modem, and CAT5 from your modem to your NIC card
that is a bad practice...there is no port forwarding without a router (and or firewall)
if all you have is a modem with one port for that CAT5 from the modem to your NIC card...you need to get a router
you can not port forwarding on a modem
unless the modem has a built in router
what is the name of your router again
thanks....let me get that...and i will be better able to assist
ok i found a pdf about your modem...it is just a cable modem ..no router features or anything of the sort
yes you should get one i would suggest a linksys wireless router....if you have more than one machine, and what connectivity around the whole house
i have two PCs, and two laptops...i use the "wireless" feature on my laptops
i use a Linksys SRX200
does the job for me
yes you connect your modem to the router
